text: Welcome to RainGen - a modded version of ClanGen!
RainGen modifies ClanGen to take place in the Rain World setting.
You're welcome to use the characters and sprites generated in this program, as long as you don't claim the sprites as your own creations or sell them for any reason.
<i>(hover over a name to see their contributions!)
Thank you to the beta testers and all those who have helped with development.
ClanGen music composed by Sharon Hurvitz. Main Menu music: Generations
RainGen music composed by Ju_E: Sundown (Piano Cover) and Emotion Thread (Across the Field Orchestra Cover)
Code is licensed under Mozilla Public License Version 2.0
